ground_truth.thought: 提供基于数据分析的国际化策略建议
ground_truth.name: StrategyRecommendation.provide_international_strategy

args.data_analysis_results: ChinaBank's international business data and customer satisfaction results

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FinancialInstitution.get_international_business_data', 'description': 'Get the international business data of a financial institution.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'institution_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the financial institution'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'international_business_data', 'description': 'the international business data of the institution'}]}, {'name': 'CustomerSurvey.get_satisfaction_results', 'description': 'Get the satisfaction survey results of customers for international services.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'service_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the international service'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'satisfaction_results', 'description': 'the satisfaction results of the customers'}]}, {'name': 'StrategyRecommendation.provide_international_strategy', 'description': 'Provide international strategy recommendations based on data analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'data_analysis_results', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the results of the data analysis'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'strategy_recommendations', 'description': 'the recommended international strategy'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名金融分析师，正在研究中国金融行业的国际化发展情况。首先，我需要获取中国银行的国际化业务数据。然后，分析这些数据以识别国际化发展的主要趋势。接下来，我需要获取客户对中国银行国际化服务的满意度调查结果。最后，请提供基于这些数据的国际化策略建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取中国金融机构的国际化业务数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
FinancialInstitution.get_international_business_data
当前工具的参数'institution_name'的值是什么?
ChinaBank
{'international_business_data': 'ChinaBank has expanded its international business to 20 countries, with a total of $5 billion in international assets.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'international_business_data': 'ChinaBank has expanded its international business to 20 countries, with a total of $5 billion in international assets.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析国际化业务数据以识别主要趋势
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
DataAnalysis.identify_trends
当前工具的参数'data'的值是什么?
ChinaBank's international business data
{'trends': 'The main trend is a rapid expansion in Asia and Europe, with a focus on cross-border financing.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'trends': 'The main trend is a rapid expansion in Asia and Europe, with a focus on cross-border financing.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取客户对国际化服务的满意度调查结果
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
CustomerSurvey.get_satisfaction_results
当前工具的参数'service_name'的值是什么?
ChinaBank's international services
{'satisfaction_results': 'Customers are highly satisfied with the cross-border financing services, with a satisfaction rate of 90%.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'satisfaction_results': 'Customers are highly satisfied with the cross-border financing services, with a satisfaction rate of 90%.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 提供基于数据分析的国际化策略建议。
